title: Huge Art Museum 2 Bedroom 2 Bath with Parking!
description:
Recently renovated two bedroom, two full bath at CITY VIEW Condominiums in the South Tower with GARAGE PARKING! This unit is located on the 19th floor with AMAZING city views from every room! Split layout features hardwood floors throughout, an open kitchen with custom island, an abundance of cabinet space, undermount sink, all tile backsplash, built-in microwave, dishwasher and garbage disposal.
Bedrooms on each side of the unit that easily accommodate large sets of furniture with ensuite baths. Enjoy your very own washer and dryer in unit and linen closet for extra storage. City View is located in the Art Museum Area steps from the world renowned Barnes Museum, Rodin Garden and Philadelphia Art Museum. Conveniently located next to Whole Foods, CVS, Wawa, and Target.
Easy commuting to Center City via Septa 48 bus line or within walking distance to Rittenhouse Square. For an active lifestyle, take advantage of the building's own gym or enjoy walking, biking, and running along the river on Kelly Drive. In the warmer months, relax laying by the outdoor pool. City View offers 24/7 doorman/security, for easy package delivery. Rent includes 1 car covered garage parking, use of on-site fitness center & pool, and water.
No Pets Allowed
Listing courtesy of Compass Pennsylvania LLC

description:
Welcome to 1520 Arch St in Norristown, PA! This 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom unit features an impressive 888 square feet of living space and offers a variable lease length to fit your needs.
Inside the apartment, you'll find select units with ceiling fans and crown molding, as well as a dishwasher, garbage disposal, kitchen islands, pantry, private balconies and patios, private entries, and spacious walk-in closets. Additionally, you'll appreciate the convenience of having a washer and dryer in the unit.
Our community offers a host of wonderful amenities, including a sparkling resort-style swimming pool, picnic area with a stainless steel barbecue, a spacious dog park, and a clubhouse with free wifi where you can also enjoy complimentary coffee. Beautiful landscaping, a grill, night patrol, a pet play area, and a pool table are also available for your enjoyment. You can rest assured that maintenance issues will be addressed promptly with our 48-hour maintenance commitment.
Attached and detached garages are available, and our clubhouse offers free WiFi for your convenience. Shopping, public transportation, and freeway access are all easily accessible from our community. We also offer online payment options, a renters insurance program, and a picnic area with a barbecue.
Don't miss out on the chance to live in this beautiful community with amazing amenities. Schedule a viewing today!

title: 4 Bedroom/2.5 Bath Fishtown Townhouse
description:
A modern and large 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhouse conveniently located in Fishtown on Trenton Avenue between Norris and Susquehanna. A back patio and a finished basement make this house really livable for a family or roommates who work from home. Lots of natural light, nice finishes and a management company that takes care of issues very quickly.  There is free, non-permitted street parking on our street as well as a lot around the neighborhood.
The first floor has a living room with an area we used for a dining table in the front (before it became a toddler play space), kitchen, and an eat-in area and half bath behind the kitchen as well as a sliding door to the back patio with some mulched space.
The basement is nicely finished and is currently being used as a second living room and home office.
Second floor has two bedrooms, a laundry room and a full bath (with a bathtub/shower). Currently used as a second home office and guest bedroom.
Third floor has two bedrooms, one very large with a walk in closet, a full bath with a tiled walk in shower. Currently used as the primary bedroom and nursery.
We have lived here happily for two and a half years (with both of us working from home and our child home with a nanny, and we still didn't feel too crowded).We have purchased a home and are looking for tenants to replace us on the lease which ends in December, with an option to renew/extend. You will need to submit an application to the management company (credit check, etc). We are moving into our new home in May and can be flexible with a move-in date.

description:

title: $815/Private room and bath in 2 bed, 2 bath Fairmount apartment
description:
I am a 31 yo femme working in the museum industry looking for a roommate to fill the available bedroom in my 2 bed, 2 bath apartment.
The apartment is in a three story rowhome, where we have private access to the basement, and our apartment is on the second and third floor of the building. There is one neighbor below us.
You will have access to your own private bathroom, which is right next to the bedroom on the second floor. The shared kitchen and living room are also on the second floor. There is a dishwasher in the kitchen, as well. In addition, the basement has a washer and dryer, and plenty of space for storage.
Your bedroom will have a private balcony and we share the roof deck, which can be accessed from the third floor, where my bedroom and bathroom are.
Rent is $815 per month. Heat, electricity, and wifi are not included.
The street itself is very quiet, but we are also 10-15 minutes from the Philadelphia Museum of Art, Fairmount Park, Whole Foods, Aldi, Jefferson Health, Wine & Spirits, and Fairmount Ave where there are many other shops, restaurants, and bars.
Preference will be given to femme and queer folks.
I have a cat, so unfortunately we cannot take in any other animals.
